violation_description: Failure to include the capitalized disclosure 'NOTICE: WE MAY SELL YOUR SENSITIVE PERSONAL DATA' in the privacy policy.
Processing biometric data (facial recognition) without obtaining strict Opt-In Consent from consumers.
Website lacks a clear and conspicuous link to opt-out of targeted advertising.
Failure to recognize a valid Universal Opt-Out Mechanism (UOOM) signal sent via Global Privacy Control.
Selling personal data of a known child (age 12) without parental consent.
